fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- (First) Cause a player to forget who they are. This is an attack.
- (Second) Cause a player to become confused, giving them false feedback about their ability.
- (Third) Cause short-term forgetfulness, roleblocking a player.
- (Forgotten) Investigate a player, learning their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- (First) If your attack fails, your target will instead be left in a state where they have no role.
- (Second) If they do not get feedback, they will receive false redirect/control/roleblock/etc messages instead.
- You do not have access to the Last chat.
- You use your Forgotten ability until a Last dies.
- Once another Last dies, you will create your own order, where only you occupy a position. You will start in the position that the dead Last was in. If multiple are dead, RNG.
- If the Last has more than 3 members, you are guaranteed to spawn to fill one of the Neutral Evil slots.
- You cannot whisper people you have investigated and found are Last members.
